ygData.subject: Re: Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She tried not to chuckle. She looked at the table and then back at him. Are you alright? as she walked to keep up with him.  She smiled at him. Yes,

::Battera::

She tried not to chuckle. She looked at the table and then back at 
him. "Are you alright?" as she walked to keep up with him.  She 
smiled at him. "Yes, let's continue to the bridge. I just hope Rex 
won't mind.  He gets mad at me when I just pop in on him like that."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm turns his head as he walks, looking back at Battera.
> 
> "So, what did a pretty bot lik-" his sentence is cut short as he 
crashes into 
> a table, the table falling over. He looks down at it.
> 
> "Oops. Oh well, one of the repair bots will take care of it."
> 
> Firearm looks back at Battera, a bit embarrased about the 
table, "Shall we 
> continue?" he asks, starting to walk off again.
